| icon           = poe2 meppu icon.png
| description    = A smoky, brown liquor native to Rauatai, meppu is distilled from malted barley and aged in oak barrels. Though traditionally served cut with water at room temperature, Rauataian students often add it to hot tea. In either form, it's regularly consumed with dark chocolate or other sweets.
